name: Verify Device Login
docs:
if user uses `phone`, `email` or `username` to login, then send type as PHONE, EMAIL, or USERNAME respectively and field with corresponding data, i.e. `phone: <phone>`, `email: <email>` etc

```json
{
  "idToken": "{{idToken}}",
  "userId": "uejqr39kbih3nyf",
  "username": "bankole",
  "code": "FHHHAP",
  "deviceId": "41606d95-96bc-4462-b884-eb8b88122e0e",
  "type": "USERNAME"
}
```

name: Add Post Media
docs:
Adding Post media: 
Post media can be either IMAGE (file uploaded by user), or GIF (selection from GIPHY api).
Body should have the following properties
- type : IMAGE / GIF,
- imageUrl: optional, include if type is GIF,
- gifData: optional, include if type is GIF

Add IMAGE request
 - FormData:
```json
type: IMAGE
media: File
```
Add IMAGE response 
```json
{
  "message": "Post media added",
  "success": true,
  "data": {
    "id": "s33iwrivehftks8",
    "type": "IMAGE",
    "imageUrl": "http://localhost:8080/api/files/08tzclgz3oh38j1/s33iwrivehftks8/screenshot_2023_01_19_033920_GzCw5lT03q.png",
    "image": "screenshot_2023_01_19_033920_GzCw5lT03q.png",
    "order": 0,
    "data": {},
    "post": "6xmau21h9poe2f8",
    "created": "2023-03-14T11:41:12.065Z",
    "updated": "2023-03-14T11:41:12.065Z"
  },
  "errors": null,
  "error": null,
  "fix": null,
  "statusCode": 200
}
```
Add Gif Request
- Json Body:
```json
{
  type: 'GIF',
  id: gif.id
  data: gif.images.original
}
```

name: Publish Post
docs:
Query parameter `publishAt` , sets when post should be published

Should create post publishing job to be executed at set time.

Success Reponse

```json
{
  "message": "Post Published",
  "success": true,
  "data": {
    "postId": "unnclu1xkg7d7ux",
    "moderated": false,
    "autoModerate": true,
    "contentWarning": false,
    "status": "PENDING",
    "created": "2023-03-13T23:54:16.866Z",
    "updated": "2023-03-13T23:54:16.866Z",
    "publishAt": null,
    "post": {
      "id": "unnclu1xkg7d7ux",
      "caption": "😀",
      "published": false,
      "allowComments": true,
      "showLikesCount": true,
      "pinned": false,
      "createdBy": "0c5725m57h2cknz",
      "urls": [],
      "repostId": null,
      "version": 0,
      "created": "2023-03-10T21:29:33.805Z",
      "updated": "2023-03-13T23:54:16.850Z",
      "deletedAt": null,
      "postMedia": [],
      "tags": [],
      "_count": {
        "comments": 0,
        "likedBy": 0,
        "postMedia": 0,
        "tags": 0,
        "views": 0
      }
    },
    "moderation": [],
    "reports": []
  },
  "errors": null,
  "error": null,
  "fix": null,
  "statusCode": 200
}
```

Error response
```json
{
  "message": "Post must have either caption or at least 1 media element",
  "success": false,
  "data": null,
  "errors": "POST_SERVICE_POST_HAS_NO_CONTENT",
  "error": "Post content empty",
  "fix": "Please add a caption or an image/media before publishing",
  "statusCode": 400
}
```

name: Delete Comment
docs:
Comment on post can be deleted by
- User who created comment
- User who created Post
- Moderator
- Admin

name: Unpublish Post
docs:
Query parameter `publishAt` , sets when post should be published

Should create post publishing job to be executed at set time.
